thread.title: GlobalShareware Launches iFoneMate iPhone Data Recovery
thread.title_full: GlobalShareware Launches iFoneMate iPhone Data Recovery

author: prbuzz.com
title: GlobalShareware Launches iFoneMate iPhone Data Recovery
text:
The GlobalShareware team is pleased to announce that their leading iPhone data recovery software is now available for mac via free download.
iPhone users who would like to recover messages, contacts, calendars, reminders, bookmarks, call histories, and photos lost can now take advantage of iFoneMate. With the software, iPhone users can retrieve lost iPhone data in three easy steps.
Users can review data before finalizing its recovery, making iFoneMate highly flexible. Chosen data is 100% restored. The Mac version of the software offers support for all iPhone products, including iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch.
To get started, iPhone users can visit the GlobalShareware website, download the app, connect their device, scan, and recover data.
Further information is available at http://www.globalshareware.com/ifonemate-mac/
About GlobalShareware
GlobalShareware offers software and applications for a better mobile digital life.
